channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Max Styler Is Releasing His Next Single on His Newly Launched Record Label: ‘A Place to Push Boundaries’
item.description: 🚀 Max Styler making waves! 🎶 New single dropping on his record label 'A Place to Push Boundaries'. Stay tuned! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert #MaxStyler

item.title: Tour news: The Cure, Turnstile / Basement, La Dispute, High Water Fest, Diana Krall, Helado Negro, more
item.description: 🎵 Exciting tour updates alert! 🚨 The Cure, Turnstile, Basement, La Dispute, and more hitting the road soon. Who's ready to rock out?! 🎸 #TourNews #MusicUpdates

item.title: The Format Announce “Boycott Heaven” Spring 2026 Tour
item.description: 🌟 Ready to rock? The Format hits the road for their epic “Boycott Heaven” Spring 2026 Tour! 🎸🎶 #TheFormatTour

item.title: Julianna Barwick & Mary Lattimore announce new LP ‘Tragic Magic’ & tour, share “Melted Moon”
item.description: ✨ Magical news alert: @juliannabarwick and @marylattimore are hitting the road with their enchanting new album 'Tragic Magic'! 🌙🎶 #NewMusicAlert #TourAnnouncement

item.title: The Second Coming of D’Angelo
item.description: Guess who's back and better than ever?! 🌟 D'Angelo is making a comeback that's sure to have us all grooving 💃🎶 #MusicNews #DangeloRevival
